caption: Relating to an exemption from certain motor fuel taxes for counties in this state.
summary: This bill amends the Tax Code to exempt counties in Texas from motor fuel (gasoline and diesel) taxes for their exclusive use. Counties that paid these taxes can claim refunds from the comptroller. This bill has no direct impact on Chinese immigrants or any other immigrant groups as it only affects county government fuel purchases.
translation: 该法案修改德克萨斯州税法，免除各县政府专用燃料(汽油和柴油)的税收。已支付这些税款的县政府可以向审计长申请退税。该法案不会直接影响中国移民或任何其他移民群体，因为它只涉及县政府的燃料采购。
committees:
1. Ways and Means Committee (主要处理税收相关法案)
2. Transportation Committee (涉及机动车燃料使用)
3. County Affairs Committee (涉及县政府事务)
